lines:
1956

August

5th,

1913.

Registrar,

Tri-State College,

ingála, Ind. 
Dear Sir:

I am enclosing herewith the record olm. Shin C. Luk, a Cinese

boy, who was here two or three years ago. I have not tried to fill in

the blank which you sent me, because it is so diftarent from our record

sheets. You will perhspa be able to transfor such facts as you wish to

your own blank.

Xours very sincerely,

Secretary

CARANO
raw: 1956 August 5th, 1913. Registrar, Tri-State College, ingála, Ind. Dear Sir: I am enclosing herewith the record olm. Shin C. Luk, a Cinese boy, who was here two or three years ago. I have not tried to fill in the blank which you sent me, because it is so diftarent from our record sheets. You will perhspa be able to transfor such facts as you wish to your own blank. Xours very sincerely, Secretary CARANO

metadata.name: Phillips Academy
metadata.abstract: Letter enclosing the Phillips Academy record sheets for S.C. Luk in lieu of a completed Tri-State credit sheet which did not correspond to Academy records.
metadata.collection: Head of School (Stearns) correspondence with Chinese alumni
